#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
long long int dp[401][100002];
int main()
{
    long long int i,j,t,n,k,sum;

    //PreComputation
    for(i=1;i<400;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<100002;j++)
        {
            if(j == 0)
            {
                dp[i][j] = 1;
            }
            else if(i == 1)
            {
                dp[i][j] = 1;
            }
            else if(j==1)
                dp[i][j] = i;
            else
                dp[i][j] = (dp[i-1][j] + dp[i][j-1])%MOD;
        }
    }
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        if(n==1 )
            cout<<"-1\n";
        else{
        sum = 0;
        for(i=1;(i*i)<=(k);i++)
        {
            sum = (sum + (((k/i - i + 1) * dp[i][n-2])%MOD))%MOD;
        }
        cout<<sum<<"\n";
        }
    }
	return 0;
}
